title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for a correctly labeled graph showing a horizontal demand curve, D, for the firm at $7.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
3 point:

  • One point is earned for identifying the total fixed cost, $10.

  • One point is earned for stating that the loss-minimizing output is 3.

  • One point is earned for stating the dollar value of the loss $21-$24= -$3,

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that the firm continues to produce because it is covering its variable cost, or P > AVC or TR > TVC or Losses < TFC.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that the long-run equilibrium price for umbrellas is $8.
